title: Requires the division of criminal justice services and the chief administrator of the courts to track the number of crimes involving automated teller machines
summary: Requires the division of criminal justice services and the chief administrator of the courts to annually track the number of crimes involving automated teller machines.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the judiciary law, in relation to requiring the division of criminal justice services and the chief administrator of the courts to track automated teller machine crimes
